data.title: Municipal Hail Insurance provides hail insurance at cost.
data.meta_description: Municipal Hail is the trusted name in hail insurance in Saskatchewan, establishing itself as a leader in providing crop hail insurance protection at cost.
data.text:
Weâ€™re Hiring!

Crop hail adjusters help farmers when they need it most. If you are retired, have a background in Ag, enjoy travelling our beautiful province and are looking for a fun and exciting job throughout the summer months this job may be for you!

More information can be found here: https://municipalhail.ca/careers

June 15

Last day to file crop reports for SMHI

June 30

Last day for new applicants to apply for coverage with SMHI

August 1

Last day to apply for coverage with AMHI or PMHI
